Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_filter_DLS_attribute

The function AIL_filter_DLS_attribute retrieves the current value of the specified sample-level attribute.

void AIL_filter_DLS_attribute(
  HDLSDEVICE dls,
  char const * name,
  void *value
);

In Parameters

dls
specifies the filter to query.
name
specifies the name of the attribute to retrieve.

Out Parameters

value
specifies an address where the 32-bit value will be returned. The type of the returned attribute is specified by "type" field in the RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY structure returned from AIL_enumerate_filter_sample_attributes.

Discussion

Sample-level attributes are attributes that are read from a single sample. For attributes that are global to the filter, use the AIL_filter_attribute function.

This function retrieves the current setting of an attribute. To change the setting, use the AIL_set_filter_DLS_preference function.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Functions: AIL_enumerate_filter_sample_attributes, AIL_filter_DLS_attribute, AIL_filter_attribute, AIL_filter_sample_attribute, AIL_filter_stream_attribute, AIL_set_filter_DLS_preference, AIL_set_filter_sample_preference, AIL_set_filter_stream_preference
Related Basic Types: HDLSDEVICE, char const *, void
Related Structures: RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY
